author: Arne Delfs
title: Merkel Continues Quarantine After Third Test Negative
description: German Chancellor Angela Merkel tested negative for the coronavirus for the third time, a German government spokesman said in an emailed statement on Monday evening.
content:
Angela Merkel
German Chancellor Angela Merkel tested negative for the coronavirus for the third time, a German government spokesman said in an emailed statement on Monday evening. 
The German leader will continue to stay in quarantine for the next few days … [+212 chars]
